蹪字的基本解释

蹪
tuí
跌倒：“世人莫蹪于山而蹪于垤。”

蹪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tuí］
［《廣韻》杜回切，平灰，定。］
颠仆，跌倒。

蹪字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　蹪； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1233第06
【廣韻】杜回切【集韻】徒回切，?音頹。【博雅】疐也。【玉篇】仆也。【類篇】楚人謂躓仆爲蹪。【淮南子·原道訓】足蹪趎塪。【註】蹪，躓也。

蹪字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蹪字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Shame
tuí
Falling down: "The world should not walk in the mountains but walk in the mountains."
Shame
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tuí］
["Guang Yun" Du Hui cut, flat gray, fixed. ]
Fall down, fall down.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youth Collection】【Foot Character Department】　蹪; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1233 Page 06
[Guang Yun] Du Huiqie [Jiyun] Only Huiqie, sound decadent. [Bo Ya] 疐也. [Jade articles] Servant too. 【Classes】Chu people say that squandering is squandering. 【Huainanzi·Yuan Daoxun】The foot of the foot. [Note] Stumble, stumble.
